creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
markings: marks on bottom, in black: N=43 [wheel-cut, painted inventory mark of the Johanneum Museum, Dresden]
medium: Hizen ware, Kakiemon style, porcelain with overglaze enamels
provenance: Augustus II the Strong, King of Poland and Elector of Saxony (until 1919/20?); C. R. Fenton & Co. Ltd. (dates?); a Lady, sold Christie's, London, February 17, 1976, lot 32; Richard W. Weatherhead (1976?-1999), sold Christie's, NY, September 15, 1999, lot 20; Mary Griggs Burke (1999-2015).
title: Bottle with chrysanthemums and plums
